Thumbs up today, thumbs down tomorrow.

Never before have I loved and hated a game with such equal passion. On the one hand you have an incredible, horror experience that can be enjoyed with a group of friends. No other game on the market comes close and few other games provide the same level of fun, excitement and scares. With a good group it is the right balance of atmosphere and gameplay that will provided an entire evening full of entertainment. Mowing down four survivors is a pleasure, escaping is deeply satisfying and the tension as you desperately try to open the exit gate before a killer catches you is palpable. On a good day every game is a blast, with all the killers and survivors are being friendly gamers out to have a great time together. People show awesome displays of skill and there is a lot to learn from each of the many killer's mechanics, much to strategise within the fun perk system and a lot to explore in the maps themselves. Matches come thick and fast, they do not overstay their welcome and the free-form style of game allows for many crazy situations. I love some of the maps designs - especially the recent ones. I love the IPs that BE has managed to get hold of. You have Saw, The Texas Chainsaw Massacre, Scream, Stranger Things and more! Most of all I love playing this game with my friends in a custom game. The hours often fly by as one match is never enough. This is helped by the near infinite character progression and the fact that many of the characters are actually well balanced. With weaker or over-powered killers and perks (eventually) getting updated. Whilst 'generator simulator' - a.k.a. staring at a loading bar - can feel like a chore at times, there is an innate feeling of unease created by the match format, needing to fix generators in order to escape, which keeps things interesting for you. Another fantastic aspect of the game its greater community - featuring fantastic streamers, content creators, memes, fanart, animations and almost an entire sub-culture of its own. Best of all is how New players feel the fear and it is glorious to witness.

ON THE OTHER HAND, at times this game is one of the most toxic, unpleasant and frustrating experiences out on the market. As I write this message, I have come off the back of 20 games in a row - YES 20 - where every single killer camped & tunneled at least one survivor to death. (Camping is the term for standing within a survivor's proximity whilst they die and tunneling is to focus on that one survivor until they are dead at the exclusion of all else.) Whilst bad manners can be found in any multiplayer online service, the game does nothing to punish nor discourage this behavior - in fact you can easily rank up using this strategy, which guarantees one or all survivors will have a terrible experience. Tunneling, slugging, looping, tea-bagging, gen-rushing, swarming, FLASH LIGHTS, Legion, camping, camping and more camping. The killer experience is often even worse. The highest levels of the game seem more about abusing all of the many 'unfun' strategies and weaknesses of its mechanisms, and mastering/exploiting those over than other types of skill. Quickly, new players realise that this is less a horror game and more a game of skill checks, and the framework surrounding its asymmetrical gameplay. Many of the top level players come across as highly abusive and rude to others. Not 'aim gods' like you might find in a First Person Shooter, or 'strategic genius'' like you'd find in an Real Time Strategy, but players who have played enough and are happy to abuse the weak parts of the games design. The title is a buggy mess and at times feels like an open beta despite being 4 years old. With friends this game is fantastic, but without you are left to many selfish or abusive survivor teammates. Or you can wait 15-30 minutes to get a Killer game only to be matched with a 'Surviving With Friends' group 10 or more ranks higher than you. The matchmaking desperately needs to be fixed. I do not claim to be even remotely good at this game, however a lack of skill isn't what has hindered my enjoyment at all. In fact, there have been some games where I have been outclassed by other players and they have offered constructive feedback and a good time was had by all. But on many days it is actually impossible to get a single game that doesn't come with bugs, mechanical abuse and nasty behaviour. This whole evening has been depressing and unpleasant. Yes, the internet is full of rude and unfriendly people. FIFA, Apex: Legends, Overwatch, League of Legends, Warframe, CS:GO, Hearthstone, you name it there are trolls and impolite people, ruining those games for others. However, Dead by Daylight over all others rewards playing this way and it is the game's greatest failure.

Also, custom survivors. When?

All in all I want to love this game and on some days I do. On others, I question why I haven't uninstalled it yet and wonder if the game is on borrowed time until a more polished, better made, actual horror experience is released onto the market. I hope it happens because Horror is a fantastic genre with very few multiplayer options. Perhaps competition might make the Developers do something about the game's obvious failings rather than doubling down on DLC and mobile titles. Perhaps a Dev will read this review and do something to fix the many issues with the game but I very much doubt it.

TLDR, This game is an exciting hot mess, ruined by rewarding the worst parts of its player-base. Have 3-4 friends to play with? Buy it! You will have some amazing fun together. Have less friends? Avoid at all costs, it isn't worth it and never will be.

Edit: Today was better.
Its good, thats all I have to say. What, did you expect more? Ain't gonna happen

Nunca te vas a cansar de jugarlo. Ademas de divertido y variado, es un juego de azar que sus generaciones de mapa y las probabilidades hacen cada partida una única. El mecanismo de juego es personal, y no dependes de otros para levelear personajes o pasartelo bien upgradeando de rango. Jugarlo con amigos es mas divertido todavía, ya que la informacion juega un rol importante. Recomendado!!

Oynanabilecek korku oyunları arasında top 1 de yer almalı . Kurgusu görsel dizaynı ve mantığı bence gayet başarılı. Oldukça fazla client hataları mevcuttu lakin son güncellemeler ile hic bir sorun kalmadı dıyebılırım. Korku oyunu severım dıyen ve çoklu oyunculu oyun arayanlar düşünmeden almalı. Ayrıca fiyatı  ve oyunu göz onunde bulundurursak bedava diyeblirim.

Gran juego!!!. Muy recomendado para jugar con amigos, es divertidisimo, mil veces mejor que ver una pelicula de este estilo. Seas asesino o sobreviviente la pasaras genial!. Ademas encuentras partidas relativamente rapido y hay de todo tipo de jugadores.

This game is very challenging. I would recommend it to people who enjoy horror and jumpscares. If you don't enjoy a rage game this game would not be for you. It can be difficult at times including overpowered killers and the toxic community. Hit them with the GG and be on your way. Playing as killer is very relaxing due to pretending the survivors are your ex boyfriends or girlfriends or a boss you just don't like. Letting your anger out on this game helps me and it can be theraputic in a way. I would recommend getting the game when it is on a discount, not full price.

I've played this game since 2019 of December and let me tell you it is not worth it, the game is still a buggy mess and the characters are not diverse what's so ever. The new update is really disappointing seeing how the new survivor is yet again another white dude when we only have one black girl, and the survivor perks are really underwhelming too, it's just bond with gens, botany knowledge 2.0 and a gen rush perk. All in one wait for a new horror game to come out and see if it's competitive or not before buying lol

An absolutely buggy game. 
I  made a review within the first month that I started playing - and it was fun! However, there are many things wrong with this game: 
- Hitboxes
- They release UNFINISHED works.

And that's not even all of it. Some of the bugs remain in the game SEVERAL YEARS AFTER THEY HAVE BEEN ADDRESSED.

Don't buy stuff from this game if you're going to play it. Get it free when you can. Don't pirate it however.
